title: Misfit unveils the Shine 2 w/ improved sleep & activity tracking, inactivity alerts, more
text:
Misfit unveils the Shine 2 w/ improved sleep & activity tracking, inactivity alerts, more 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Yesterday 
Misfit, the company co-founded by John Scully, this evening has officially taken the wraps off its Shine 2 wearable. The device offers a ful...
